name: Along the Rift
description:
Along the Rift

Maya and her parents are hiking in the mountains,  when suddenly she falls into a deep rift.

She is now alone, trying to find a way out, with the distant help of her parents. 

You embody this 10 year old kid, and your journey begins.

Along the Rift is a narrative adventure game set to explore the coming of age of a young girl alongside her fears, imagination and feelings.

You can play with a controller, or with a mouse and keyboard.

The left stick, or the ZQSD/WASD keys are used to move in the environment.
The right stick, or the mouse, is used to rotate the camera around.

Along The Rift is a vertical slice, made in 4 months,
by 11 students of the CNAM-ENJMIN school in France.
